description:
"Got the No.1 Productivity App in tons of Appstores around the world"
*Complete file manager for your private stuff*

a Stylish Pattern Lock for your iPhone
Organize your private photos ,videos ,documents,contacts and notes into secured folders and enjoy both a private camera and a private reminder
What if your iPhone is lost or stolen? What if someone deleted important work document you’ve been working on since forever? Are you worried that someone will grab your phone and go through your private things?   

MyThings not only keeps your private photos and videos locked and organized.  It comes with a Private Camera, Stealth-mode Browser, Private Reminders, Private Document’s drawer/viewer and Private Text Notes.

With MyThings Private Camera, you can take Private Photos and Videos even before unlocking MyThings instead of having to use the Standard Camera and then import your Photos/Videos.

Create Private Reminders that only you can read.  MyThings asks for your password/pattern before showing the Reminder details.

Use MyThings Stealth-mode Browser and rest assured your Browsing Data, History and Passwords are secure.

Type down your private thoughts and ideas in MyThings and view or edit them any time.

MyThings is a private pattern lock and a secured file manager that can help you to do the following and much more:

- Hide your private files from others
- Organize your files
- Hide private photos
- Hide private videos
- View private photos in style
- View private videos in style
- Arrange private photos in folders
- Take private photos quickly using the private camera
- Organize private photos
- Hide secret contacts information

FEATURES: 

- COLORFUL DESIGN
Protect your data in stylish & colorful folders that will keep your data organized and looking good. 


- CHOOSE YOUR LOCK TYPE
Use pattern lock, PIN code or MyThings cartoon pattern to lock all your private data.


- PROTECT YOUR PRIVATE DATA
Store Documents, Notes and Contacts safe inside MyThings.
View your Photos, videos and documents with pinch zoom.


- PRIVATE REMINDERS
Set reminders that go off and require unlocking MyThings to view.


- PRIVATE BROWSER
Browse the internet privately, securely and in full screen using MyThings Stealth Browser.
Easily remove any traces of your browsing history.


- PRIVATE CAMERA
Use MyThings built-in Camera to take Private photos and videos even before unlocking.


- RETINA/HD INTERFACE
High quality beautiful and colorful interface makes viewing your private data inside MyThings even more pleasurable.


EXTRA SECURITY FEATURES

•Configurable Auto-Lock.
•Escape/Lock screen in every screen.
•Secure iTunes access to Private files.
•Option to do Data or Factory reset.
•Intrusions report with photo-capture and date/time-stamp.

Last Update:

- Directly call your private contacts from within MyThings
- Free new theme - enjoy the new look
- Introducing MyThings New Store - enjoy new features
- Lock and Password retrieval 
- Bulk Delete and move for photos and videos
- Sound Level Control
- Portrait and landscape document orientation.
releaseNotes:
Forgot your pattern? Install this update and get it right to your mail. 

Check out our collection of smart and useful productivity apps in Youxel Store right in your settings.

Fixed a bug in MyThings Memos and other minor bug fixes.
